title: People’s Pharmacy: Touching receipts affects BPA levels in cashiers
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Health - Today 
Q. In France, most receipts have printed on their backs “Papier garanti sans bisphenol et sans phenol.” Apparently, these two substances...
